00032 #ifndef __LWIP_MEM_H__
00033 #define __LWIP_MEM_H__
00034 
00035 #include "lwip/opt.h"
00036 #include "lwip/arch.h"
00037 
00038 #if MEM_SIZE > 64000l
00039 typedef u32_t mem_size_t;
00040 #else
00041 typedef u16_t mem_size_t;
00042 #endif /* MEM_SIZE > 64000 */
00043 
00044 
00045 void mem_init(void);
00046 
00047 void *mem_malloc(mem_size_t size);
00048 void mem_free(void *mem);
00049 void *mem_realloc(void *mem, mem_size_t size);
00050 void *mem_reallocm(void *mem, mem_size_t size);
00051 
00052 #define MEM_ALIGN_SIZE(size) (((size) + MEM_ALIGNMENT - 1) & ~(MEM_ALIGNMENT-1))
00053 
00054 #define MEM_ALIGN(addr) ((void *)(((mem_ptr_t)(addr) + MEM_ALIGNMENT - 1) & ~(mem_ptr_t)(MEM_ALIGNMENT-1)))
00055 
00056 #endif /* __LWIP_MEM_H__ */
